meanings.definition: Lasting for the duration of a year.
meanings.sent1: The yearlong journey around the world was exhausting.
meanings.sent2: She enjoyed the yearlong sunshine in the tropical paradise.
meanings.sent3: The yearlong school project finally came to an end.
meanings.sent4: His yearlong dedication to fitness paid off with a healthier lifestyle.
meanings.sent5: The yearlong wait for the concert was worth it when the band finally played.

meanings.definition: Occurring or existing throughout the entire year.
meanings.sent1: The yearlong commitment to volunteering made a difference in the community.
meanings.sent2: The flowers in the garden bloomed yearlong due to the mild climate.
meanings.sent3: The yearlong sale at the store attracted many customers.
meanings.sent4: Her yearlong smile brightened up everyone's day.
meanings.sent5: The yearlong rain in the region caused flooding in many areas.
